original: 約為東漢順帝時琅邪人，拜師于吉，得授《太平清領書》，順帝時曾入宮獻上此書，但未被收入府庫。後入紵嶼山，得道飛昇。
text: Around the time of Emperor Shun in the Eastern Han Dynasty, Langxie, who was taught by Yu Ji, was awarded the "Tai Ping Qing Ling Shu". This book was presented in the palace during the Shun Emperor, but it was not included in the treasury. After entering Longyu Island, the road soars.
